channel.title: How do you add arrows?
channel.description: I was wanting to know how to add arrows where I can shoot arrows out of my bow without going up to them and melee them with my bow :confused: Also, When I try to make the folder [b]NOT[/b] Read-Only, I will close out the folder but it says it still.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2007, 04:52:23 PM[/size][hr]someone please help me!!!! any1 here?

item.title: How do you add arrows?

I was wanting to know how to add arrows where I can shoot arrows out of my bow without going up to them and melee them with my bow Also, When I try to make the folder NOT Read-Only, I will close out the folder but it says it still.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2007, 04:52:23 PM[/size][hr]someone please help me!!! any1 here?
